metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart prays to Shar. Part of her recurring behaviour in camp at night.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Praise be to Lady Shar. As the sun retreats once again, all becomes your realm.
2.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Let the pains of the day be forgotten, soothed by your embrace.
1.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

8.speaker: Shadowheart
8.text: May a time come when the sun never rises again, and your darkness reaches eternity.
8.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: Mistress of the Night, guide my hand, my step, my mind, and my blade.
5.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

7.speaker: Shadowheart
7.text: Let me follow in your path. Let me become one with your umbral splendour.
7.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: Guide me where others fear to tread. Guide me to your embrace.
3.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.text: Lend me your strength, my Lady of Loss, for the battles yet to come.
6.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more martial here.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: May the lives of your enemies be snuffed out like guttering candles.
0.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more martial here.

10.speaker: Shadowheart
10.text: Let the earth feast on the blood of the faithless, until only those who seek the embrace remain.
10.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more martial here.

11.speaker: Shadowheart
11.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more contrite/confessional here

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: I have ventured far from shadows. I have shared words with unbelievers. I have followed your teachings imperfectly.
4.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more contrite/confessional here

9.speaker: Shadowheart
9.text: Grant me the time and guidance I need to become your vessel, my lady.
9.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more contrite/confessional here
